item.description:
Join NHCer Simone for a Halloween Party at Olde School!

Come to Old School for a Halloween get together. Dance to the music of The Greg Glover Band starting at 8:00. Enjoy $5.00 Pumpkin Martinis and other drink specials. Costumes are optional.

Simone will host this meetup and will add contact information as the date nears.

The Event is being cross posted with other groups, so be prepaired for an obviously larger "meetup" crowd than just what you see here.
item.how_to_find_us: Simone will Host and will post contact information as the date nears...
item.name: Halloween Party at Olde School Saloon and Bistro
